title: Applause and Boo

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Record clapping or "woo!" on one switch and "booo" on the other switch
• Have the switch user be the judge of your jokes, talents, dancing or anything that they will find funny!
• Tell the switch user your joke or show them your dance moves and they can hit their switch to give you a round of applause or boo you

tooltipText: Use 2 switches to give a round of applause or boo
